Package game

Class CollectibleCollision

java.lang.Object
game.CollectibleCollision
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.CollisionListener, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArmourCollision, GunCollision, HealthPotionCollision
public abstract class CollectibleCollision extends Object implements city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
Provides a base for handling collisions between a player and various collectibles in the game.

This abstract class implements CollisionListener to define common functionality for collision events involving collectible items. Specific types of collectibles can extend this class to implement their unique collision behaviors. It stores references to the player and the collectible involved in the collision, which are essential for determining the outcomes of collision events.

Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • CollectibleCollision

      public CollectibleCollision(Player player, Collectible collectible)
      Constructs a new collision handler for interactions between a player and a collectible.

      This constructor initializes the collision handler with references to the player and the specific collectible involved. These references are used to manage and resolve the collision events according to the game's rules and mechanics.

      Parameters:
      player - The player involved in the collision.
      collectible - The collectible involved in the collision.
